comments:
After running the IDE for 1-2 hours I needed to modify my build.xml as it missed
a path (project in eclipse was well defined). 

Double clicking on the file in the MyEclipse perspective / Package View returned
an Exception : 
   Cannot create file buffer

Trace is provided herebelow.
There was of course a few failed RUNS (build classpath : OK, run classpath :
notOK in ANT) invoked from the ant view in the MyEclipseIDE perspective.


\T,

--

Thomas - this looks more like a MyEclipse or an Eclipse bug. There are no AJDT 
classes involved in that stack trace, so I am going to close this bug.  Please 
re-open if you have cause to believe that it is us.
